FREEI-4267 and FREEI-4639 *15.0.19* Packaging of ver 15.0.19 *15.0.18* FREEI-4459 CID when routing Inbound Route to Misc Destination using trunk CID *15.0.17* FREEI-4577 and FREEI-4459 *15.0.16* FREEPBX-23226 Expand pjsip match setting to support 8192 bytes *15.0.15* FREEPBX-23249 Deleting an extension doesn't mark database as needing reload *15.0.14* FREEI-4267 *15.0.13* bump *15.0.12.103* Bugfix/FREEPBX-23256 graphql api did does not include destination information *15.0.12.102* FREEPBX-23267 Add controls for asterisk http server TLS version *15.0.12.101* FREEI-4491 added condition to accept boolean value of string type *15.0.12.100* FREEI-4490 Added condition to check whether the setting is already updated *15.0.12.99* update macroDialone.php to fix FREEPBX-22038 *15.0.12.98* FREEI-4269 Modified condition for the fields 'emergency_cid' and 'outboundcid' to accept the empty value same as GUI *15.0.12.97* FREEI-4033 Created new GQL Api to update, fetch advance settings with unit tests *15.0.12.96* FREEI-4100 Updated default settings with actual input values *15.0.12.95* FREEI-4153 fixed the issue in outbound routes when a non-used trunk is deleted *15.0.12.94* FREEI-4100 Refactored all core device gql api's with new unit tests and replaced unexistent field with correct value *15.0.12.93* FREEI-4126 Added condition to delete the old did and create new did when did and cidnum value is changed while updating inboundRoute *15.0.12.92* FREEPBX-22892 D&U ringgroup callerid issue *15.0.12.91* FREEPBX-23025 Revert DID change check *15.0.12.90* FREEI-4126 and FREEI-4127 GQL API fixes *15.0.12.89* FREEI-4101 Changed 'rvolume', 'pmmaxretries' and 'pmminlength' field type to string because it is causing internal error for already existing data which has empty string and added default value for 'rvolume' field *15.0.12.88* FREEI-4058 Added condition to limit max contacts value to 100 while adding new device *15.0.12.87* FREEI-4101 Added default values for pmmaxretries and pmminlength fields *15.0.12.86* FREEI-4058 Added condition to limit max contacts value to 100 *15.0.12.85* FREEI-4018 added condition to throw error whern trying to add extensions beyond the system extension license limit *15.0.12.84* FREEPBX-22676 Function CALLERPRES not registered *15.0.12.83* FREEPBX-22676 Function CALLERPRES not registered *15.0.12.82* Fixing the bulkhandler
